live_updates: This issue has been resolved.  Thank you for your patience.
Tech crews continue to work in the area to restore services.
Our technicians continue to repair services through the night. We apologize for the extended disruption.
On-site technicians continue working diligently to resolve this outage.
We're looking into it. Stay tuned for updates.
64262.summary: Some customers in the Timberlea area of Fort McMurray are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
64262.title: July 19 - Fort McMurray (Timberlea) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
